name: Exterminator
description:
EXTERMINATOR is a simple casual 2D shooting game.

prologue
One day, an anomaly that gave people mysterious pain began to spread.
While the damage is increasing day by day for unknown reasons, Jayden
As a brilliant inventor, you create a device that allows you to see anomalies.
While solving an anomaly around town, one day a mysterious phone call comes in.
I'm not sure about the phone call, but I'm going to take a look.

features

Simple operation keys
Enjoy the game with helpful information for play along with guided operation explanations. We have information to help you play.

limited vision
What might give you trouble is the limited field of view. Pay attention and move forward.

upgrade
There are things that can help you when clearing a stage. Choose what you need.

be careful. If you fall, you have to start over.
Complete the quest by clearing the final stage.
